Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
Class that manages all the game operations and elements.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame(int actionId, int playerId, Map<String,String> options) throws Exception
      Asks the ActionManager to run the actionId demanded by playerId with options. This action should come from the Controller
      Parameters:
      actionId - the id of the Action that is asked
      playerId - the id of the Player that asked for that action
      options - the options to perform the action correctly as asked
      Throws:
      Exception

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws Exception
      Asks the ActionManager to generate all the Actions, run the setup, and prepare the character cards actions if the game being played is an expert game.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • setExpertMode

      public void setExpertMode(boolean expertMode)
      Sets the boolean which tells whether the game being played is an expert game.
      Parameters:
      expertMode - a boolean

    • getExpertMode

      public boolean getExpertMode()
      Gets the boolean which tells whether the game being played is an expert game.
      Returns:
      true if the game being played is an expert game

    • getLastPlayedCharacterCard

      public Integer[] getLastPlayedCharacterCard()
      Returns data about last played card.
      Returns:
      array with player id in first position and card id in second position

    • setLastPlayedCharacterCard

      public void setLastPlayedCharacterCard(int playerId, int cardId)
      Sets the new played card.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the id of the player that used the card
      cardId - the id of the used card
